"Actually, Techy and I are taking him down to vector C to get him 
some weapons." Sky Knight replied into his comm on his desk. "He's 
trained far enough, and he seems like he can control himself. He'll 
stay by us, I'm sure. Tehcy and I are going in a few cycles."
